name: Okada Ride - Keke
description:
Danger! Play Okada Ride, see how long you last when taking an Okada Ride!

Okada is the name for commercial motorbikes that roam from Nigeria to Sierra Leone. Generally light, small engine motorbikes, that are almost unbreakable! Okada Riders are the Fearless Taxi drivers who brave congested traffic and DANGEROUS driving condtions everyday to transport people and make their livings on Okada motorbikes. How does it feel to take an Okada Ride?

Aggressively weave through the streets of West Africa on your Okada Taxi Ride. Try to get to your destination as quickly as possible by collecting as much Fuel and Money as you can while avoiding potholes, avoiding other vehicles, and not running out of fuel along the way. Start your Okada Experience now!
